parameters.name: DedicatedHostType
parameters.description: The dedicated host type. For more information, see [Dedicated host types](~~68564~~).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: SupportedInstanceTypeFamily
parameters.description: The ECS instance family supported by the dedicated host type.
